meanings.definition: A small electrode used for measuring electrical activity on a microscopic scale.
meanings.sent1: The scientist carefully placed the microelectrode to study the tiny signals in the cell.
meanings.sent2: Researchers inserted the microelectrode into the brain tissue to record neural impulses.
meanings.sent3: The microelectrode decided to take a closer look at the electrical party inside the cell.
meanings.sent4: Like a tiny detective, the microelectrode uncovered the hidden electrical secrets of the cell.
meanings.sent5: With the precision of a miniature tool, the microelectrode revealed the intricate electrical patterns.

meanings.definition: An electrode that is tiny in size and used for precise measurements in scientific experiments.
meanings.sent1: The microelectrode was so small that it could fit on the tip of a pencil.
meanings.sent2: Scientists relied on the microelectrode to accurately measure the electrical signals in the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The microelectrode felt like a superhero in the world of small electrodes.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of electrodes, the microelectrode stood out like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: With its minuscule size, the microelectrode provided unparalleled precision in the experiment.
